info.description: Loan microservice contains set of fine grained services to handle with all the loan related informations like, update the User information, generate uinque application id, fetch the nearest branch details, vehicle make and other related information.
info.title: Loan Microservice

get.description: Service to fetch the Branch Details based on the Given Zip code

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: Input the zipcode value to get the branches available in the location
